items.title: Realistic Text-to-Speech
items.description: Make your audio generated by AI sound like a real person with human-like intonations and pauses.

items.title: Language Support
items.description: Break the language barrier with our dual language support for English and Chinese.

items.title: Well-Trained
items.description: Rest assured in the efficiency of ChatTTS, designed from over 40,000 hours of pre training

items.title: Open-Source
items.description: Get access to well-maintained and regularly updated source code on GitHub.

s1.title: Clone Project from GitHub
s1.description: Navigate to the open-source repository, choose the appropriate folder, and clone the remote repository to your local machine using git commands. Alternatively, you can choose to manually download it from GitHub.

s2.title: Install Reqirements
s2.description: Enter the folder where you downloaded the files in the terminal or command line, then run the following command to download the dependencies, which are listed in the requirements.txt file.

s3.title: Initialize ChatTTS
s3.description: Import the package, and declare the Python modules and instances we need.

s4.title: Declare Your Text
s4.description: Determine the text you need to generate speech for, and save it as 'texts'.

s6.title: Save Wav File
s6.description: Save the speech to your local machine.
